headline: Can Lululemon’s (LULU) New Executive Lineup Revitalize Its US Growth Strategy?
summary: Lululemon Athletica recently announced a major leadership change, with Celeste Burgoyne departing as President of the Americas and Global Guest Innovation at the end of 2025, while restructuring executive roles and appointing André Maestrini as President and Chief Commercial Officer to oversee all regions and channels globally. This executive transition is paired with the appointment of Carla Anderson as Senior Vice President and General Manager of North American stores, signaling renewed...
